comments:
I ran the RCP version of the UI and added a metadata repository that I had generated using the launch config.  Then I created a profile "Foo" using the default install folder in the dialog.  When I tried to install the SDK into the new profile, I got this NPE:

(Installing the SDK in the same way from a workbench running the UI did not fail in this way.  Not sure why, it could be some difference in the way the environment is defined...?)

-------------

Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.equinox.internal.prov.director.Picker.findInstallableUnit(Picker.java:64)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.director.NewDependencyExpander.collectFlavorProviders(NewDependencyExpander.java:225)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.director.NewDependencyExpander.collectOptionalInstallableUnits(NewDependencyExpander.java:152)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.director.NewDependencyExpander.collectMatches(NewDependencyExpander.java:141)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.director.NewDependencyExpander.algo(NewDependencyExpander.java:267)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.director.NewDependencyExpander.expand(NewDependencyExpander.java:95)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.director.NewSimpleDirector.install(NewSimpleDirector.java:64)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.ui.internal.ProvisioningUtil.install(ProvisioningUtil.java:290)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.ui.operations.InstallOperation.doExecute(InstallOperation.java:34)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.prov.ui.operations.ProvisioningOperation.execute(ProvisioningOperation.java:45)
	at org.eclipse.core.commands.operations.DefaultOperationHistory.execute(DefaultOperationHistory.java:511)
	... 2 more

This failure occurs when the profile selected for install does not have the flavor "tooling"

We need to fail more gracefully, I had no idea what was going on.

The NPE no longer occurs, but you end up with a completely broken install if you give a blank flavor, or an invalid flavor that doesn't exist in the metadata. The install dir contained only the eclipse.exe file - no eclipse.ini, no config directory, no install registry.
